ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from entering the same email for both contacts
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(Email__c), ISCHANGED(Contact2_Email__c) ), Email__c = Contact2_Email__c, NOT(ISBLANK (Email__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter the same email for both contacts. Either enter a different email or only use the email address for the Mother.
